The vessel you choose significantly influences your sip experience through a combination of science and sensory perception.

Any drink that you'd serve straight upp can go in a coupe, shaken or stirred, without any ice.
Typically wide brimmed with a thick base, making it easier to muddle berries or other ingredients before the main liquid is added.
Ideal for serving sparkling bevarages, the long, upright bowl successfully retains carbonation and captures flavour.
